local_intent: Perform a short transfer push (0.1 m at 180°) on the T-block and verify proximity to the green target.
assumptions: T-block is accessible; prior contact may already be established
Single short push is part of a multi-segment transfer toward the target
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: align to T-block, execute the second shorter push (0.1 toward 180°), and check progress using IsAt(green_target). Uses only library nodes and binned values.
